name: Death & Flowers #Special
description:
A special compilation version of all the pieces of the Death & Flowers. Includes #001, #002, #003, #004, #005, #006, #007, #008 and the special prototype piece that was minted on Pentas.io the Death & Flowers #000.

The Death & Flowers series. A series that help me applying experimentation of colors and material on my render. Endless prototype and colors combination will be release in the future. 

A reinterpretation of ornamentation in 'Batik' in a 3D projection. Using flowers and bones to show an irony of life and deaths. Highlighting three different flowers that represent their own meaning; hibiscus (heart), lotus (perfection) and peony (love). The hibiscus and peony surrounds the skeletal body as the lotus slowly falling down from the statue. Decorated around the skeletal statue that embodies the meaning deaths.
